attributes.review: I didn’t know our orange 🍊🎃, narcissistic 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨  crazy-haired 💇🏼 dictator Heat Miser 🔥🤡 had an app on the App Store. attributes.review: I got this app bc Trump 2020 ya know? 🇺🇸but every time I open it something weird happens...it started when it asked me to put my phone number in so I was like ok📞Immediately afterwards, I got a FaceTime call so I was like oh it must be from the Trump administration!😘So I answered but all I heard from the other end was a horse clip clopping down the street🐎so I was like huh that’s weird it must be a butt dial. Right before I was about to hang up, a hand reached through my phone and stole it out of my hand! 😡Like rude... so then I downloaded the app on my iPad bc I still wanted those trump updates😍and when I opened the app, my toast burnt!!🍞Basically whenever I do anything with this app, something bad happens I would not download it if I were u.
attributes.title: This app is working some voodoo magic

attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded the app the FBI came to my house and destroyed it then arrested my dog. So then the app ask for my card info and then trump and his family used my card. Now I am homeless. So then I saw a fairy and I grant my wishes and then fairy died so I was stuck with a pet robe. Then I got hungry so I went to McDonald’s and they said trump added McGlizzies so I took some and went to the White House. And the app start being racist. I walked in the White House and trump was raping his family then he murdered his chef. I put all the McGlizzies in the house and left. While I was leaving I saw all the rape vans, murder weapons, criminals, drugs, etc in trumps secret building that he runs. The app made the blue whale challenge come back and it’s actually all the racist people and trump and mike pence are leading them they are murdering people. The app is so bad and they ask for all your personal info. I 100% DO NOT 
recommend. NEXTTT CALLERR.
